registrationStatus.description: If specified, only users whose registration status is registered or anon will be counted to the group.

registrationAgeAtLeast.description: If specified, only users whose registration age is at least the specified days at the requested data will be counted to the group.

registrationAgeAtMost.description: If specified, only users whose registration age is at most the specified days at the requested data will be counted to the group.

userGroups.description: If specified, only users who belongs to the specified groups will be counted to the group.

totalEditsAtLeast.description: If specified, only users with total edits at least this amount at the requested date will be counted to the group.

totalEditsAtMost.description: If specified, only users with total edits at most this amount at the requested date will be counted to the group.

inPeriodEditsAtLeast.description: If specified, only users with edits at least this amount in the specified days before the requested date will be counted to the group.

inPeriodEditsAtMost.description: If specified, only users with edits at most this amount in the specified days before the requested date will be counted to the group.
